text:
A convenient and excellent way to go to places in Malaysia like Johor Bahru, Malacca, Kuala Lumpur and more.

You can take the comfy bus coaches.

Taxis will bring you from Johor Bahru, City Square to Queen Street, Singapore vice versa.
Terminal bis to go to Johor Bahru Malaysia. You can pay by cash or with ezlink card.
All of their staff are the star of the show.. boarding process went smoothly and more importantly the bus depart on time..or in my case earlier..after all the registered passenger has boarded
Easy to take bus from Singapore to Johor. The yellow bus is great but sometimes the frequency is really bad.

Singapore malaysia bus transit cw2 and s&s bus service . All Malaysia and Singaporean people who wish to travel by public transportation and easy and fast by land to malaysia Singapore this one of the place to walk-in and buy bust ticket and travel . . Every one hour have 1 bus traveling to Malaysia and Singapore to cross country.
